008 *******************************************************************************/
009package imagingbook.common.geometry.circle;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012import static java.lang.Math.abs;
013import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
014
015import java.awt.Shape;
016import java.awt.geom.Arc2D;
017import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.shape.ShapeProducer;
022import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
023
024/**
025 * Represents a geometric circle with center point (xc, yc) and radius r.
026 * Instances are immutable.
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 *
030 */
031public class GeometricCircle implements ShapeProducer {
032        
033        private final double xc, yc, r;
034
035        public double getXc() {
036                return xc;
037        }
038
039        public double getYc() {
040                return yc;
041        }
042
043        public double getR() {
044                return r;
045        }
046
047        public GeometricCircle(double xc, double yc, double r) {
048                if (r < 0) {
049                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("negative circle radius");
050                }
051                this.xc = xc;
052                this.yc = yc;
053                this.r = r;             
054        }
055        
056        /**
057         * Constructor.
058         * Creates a new {@link GeometricCircle} instance from parameters p = [xc, yc, r].
059         * @param p circle parameters [xc, yc, r]
060         */
061        public GeometricCircle(double[] p) {
062                this(p[0], p[1], p[2]);
063        }
064        
065        /**
066         * Constructor.
067         * Creates a new {@link GeometricCircle} from a {@link AlgebraicCircle} instance.
068         * @param ac a {@link AlgebraicCircle} instance
069         */
070        public GeometricCircle(AlgebraicCircle ac) {
071                this(getGeometricCircleParameters(ac));
072        }
073        
074        private static double[] getGeometricCircleParameters(AlgebraicCircle ac) {
075                double[] p = ac.getParameters();
076                if (Arithmetic.isZero(p[0])) {
077                        throw new RuntimeException("infinite circle radius");
078                }
079                double A = p[0];
080                double B = p[1];
081                double C = p[2];
082                double D = p[3];
083                double xc = -B / (2 * A);
084                double yc = -C / (2 * A);
085                double r = sqrt(sqr(B) + sqr(C) - 4 * A * D) / abs(2 * A);
086                return new double[] {xc, yc, r};
087        }
088        
089        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
090        
091        /**
092         * Return a vector of parameters for this circle.
093         * The length of the vector and the meaning of the parameters depends
094         * on the concrete circle type.
095         * 
096         * @return a vector of parameters
097         */
098        public double[] getParameters() {
099                return new double[] {xc, yc, r};
100        }
101        
102        public Pnt2d getCenter() {
103                return Pnt2d.from(xc, yc);
104        }
105
106        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
107        
108        /**
109         * Calculates and returns the mean of the squared distances between this circle 
110         * and a set of 2D points.
111         *
112         * @param points a set of sample points (usually the points used for fitting)
113         * @return the mean squared error
114         */
115        public double getMeanSquareError(Pnt2d[] points) {
116                final int n = points.length;
117                double sumR2 = 0;
118                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
119                        sumR2 += sqr(getDistance(points[i]));
120                }
121                return sumR2 / n;
122        }
123        
124        /**
125         * Returns the (unsigned) distance between the specified point
126         * and this circle. The result is always non-negative.
127         * 
128         * @param p a 2D point
129         * @return the point's distance from the circle
130         */
131        @Override
132        public double getDistance(Pnt2d p) {
133                return Math.abs(getSignedDistance(p));
134        }
135        
136        /**
137         * Returns the signed distance between the specified point
138         * and this circle. The result is positive for points outside
139         * the circle, negative inside.
140         * 
141         * @param p a 2D point
142         * @return the point's signed distance from the circle
143         */
144        public double getSignedDistance(Pnt2d p) {
145                double dx = p.getX() - this.xc;
146                double dy = p.getY() - this.yc;
147                double rp = Math.hypot(dx, dy);
148                return rp - this.r;
149        }
150        
151        // ------------------------------------------------------------------
152
153        private Shape getCenterShape(double radius) {
154                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
155                path.moveTo(xc - radius, yc);
156                path.lineTo(xc + radius, yc);
157                path.moveTo(xc, yc - radius);
158                path.lineTo(xc, yc + radius);
159                return path;
160        }
161        
162        private Shape getOuterShape() {
163                return new Arc2D.Double(xc - r, yc - r, 2 * r, 2 * r, 0, 360, Arc2D.OPEN);
164        }
165        
166        @Override
167        public Shape getShape(double scale) {
168                return getOuterShape() ;
169        }
170        
171        @Override
172        public Shape[] getShapes(double scale) {
173                return new Shape[] {getOuterShape(), getCenterShape(scale)};
174        }
175        
176        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
177        
178        @Override
179        public boolean equals(Object other) {
180                if (this == other) {
181                        return true;
182                }
183                if (!(other instanceof GeometricCircle)) {
184            return false;
185        }
186                return this.equals((GeometricCircle) other, Arithmetic.EPSILON_DOUBLE);
187        }
188        
189        
190        public boolean equals(GeometricCircle other, double tolerance) {
191                return 
192                                Arithmetic.equals(xc, other.xc, tolerance) &&
193                                Arithmetic.equals(yc, other.yc, tolerance) &&
194                                Arithmetic.equals(r, other.r, tolerance) ;
195        }
196        
197        public boolean equals(GeometricCircle other, double tolXc, double tolYc, double tolR) {
198                return 
199                                Arithmetic.equals(xc, other.xc, tolXc) &&
200                                Arithmetic.equals(yc, other.yc, tolYc) &&
201                                Arithmetic.equals(r, other.r, tolR) ;
202        }
203        
204
205        public GeometricCircle duplicate() {
206                return new GeometricCircle(this.getParameters());
207        }
208        
209        @Override
210        public String toString() {
211                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s [xc=%f, yc=%f, r=%f]", 
212                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), xc, yc, r);
213        }
214}
